named-query.name: DocfaAnomalie.getAnomalie
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaAnomalie d WHERE d.tipo is null OR d.tipo = :tipo ORDER BY d.descrizione

named-query.name: DocfaAnomalie.getById
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaAnomalie d WHERE d.id = :id

named-query.name: DocfaIciReport.getById
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaIciReport d WHERE d.idRep = :id

named-query.name: DocfaIciReport.getVie
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.viaDocfa FROM DocfaIciReport d WHERE UPPER(d.viaDocfa) LIKE '%'||:via||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaIciReport.getCount
named-query.query: SELECT dir.fornitura, COUNT (dir.idRep), (SELECT COUNT (d.idRep) FROM DocfaIciReport d WHERE dir.fornitura = d.fornitura AND d.flgElaborato = '1'), (SELECT COUNT (d.idRep) FROM DocfaIciReport d WHERE dir.fornitura = d.fornitura AND d.flgElaborato = '1' AND d.flgAnomalie = '0'), (SELECT COUNT (d.idRep) FROM DocfaIciReport d WHERE dir.fornitura = d.fornitura AND d.flgElaborato = '1' AND d.flgAnomalie = '1') FROM DocfaIciReport dir GROUP BY dir.fornitura ORDER BY dir.fornitura DESC

named-query.name: DocfaIciReport.getIci
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitTIciOggetto o, SitTIciVia v WHERE o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub ORDER BY o.yeaDen DESC

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getSoggetti
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM DocfaIciReportSogg s WHERE s.id.fkIdRep = :report ORDER BY s.id.dataInizioPossesso, s.id.dataFinePossesso

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getSoggettiTitolari
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM DocfaIciReportSogg s WHERE s.id.fkIdRep = :report AND s.flgTitolareDataDocfa = '1' ORDER BY s.id.dataInizioPossesso, s.id.dataFinePossesso

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getCognomi
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.ragiSoci FROM DocfaIciReportSogg s WHERE UPPER(s.ragiSoci) LIKE :cognome||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getNomi
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.nome FROM DocfaIciReportSogg s WHERE UPPER(s.nome) LIKE :nome||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getCodFisc
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.codiFisc FROM DocfaIciReportSogg s WHERE UPPER(s.codiFisc) LIKE :codFisc||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getIciAnte
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContrib c, SitTIciOggetto o, SitTIciVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = 4 AND a.id.progEs = 3 AND a.id.idDwh = :catpkid AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = 2 AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND b.id.progEs = 1 AND s.id = b.id.idDwh AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggIci AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.yeaDen <= TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (:datadocfa, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy') AND (o.foglio = :foglio OR o.foglio IS NULL) AND (o.numero = :numero OR o.numero IS NULL) AND (LPAD(NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub OR o.sub IS NULL) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitTIciOggetto o, SitTIciVia v WHERE o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub)

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getIciPost
named-query.query: SELECT o,v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContrib c, SitTIciOggetto o, SitTIciVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = 4 AND a.id.progEs = 3 AND a.id.idDwh = :catpkid AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = 2 AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND b.id.progEs = 1 AND s.id = b.id.idDwh AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggIci AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.yeaDen > TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (:datadocfa, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy') AND (o.foglio = :foglio OR o.foglio IS NULL) AND (o.numero = :numero OR o.numero IS NULL) AND (LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub OR o.sub IS NULL) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitTIciOggetto o, SitTIciVia v WHERE o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub)

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getIciAnteUiu
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContrib c, SitTIciOggetto o, SitTIciVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = 4 AND a.id.progEs = 3 AND a.id.idDwh = :catpkid AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = 2 AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND b.id.progEs = 1 AND s.id = b.id.idDwh AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggIci AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.yeaDen <= TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (:datadocfa, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy') AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getIciPostUiu
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContrib c, SitTIciOggetto o, SitTIciVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = 4 AND a.id.progEs = 3 AND a.id.idDwh = :catpkid AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = 2 AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND b.id.progEs = 1 AND s.id = b.id.idDwh AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggIci AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.yeaDen > TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (:datadocfa, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy') AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getIciAnteCiv
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale aso, SitSoggettoTotale bso, SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContrib c, SitTIciOggetto o , SitTIciVia v WHERE aso.id.fkEnteSorgente = '4' AND aso.id.progEs = '3' AND aso.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND aso.fkSoggetto = bso.fkSoggetto AND bso.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bso.id.progEs = '1' AND bso.id.idDwh = s.id AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggIci AND o.yeaDen <= TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (:datadocfa, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy') AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND v.id || '|' || NVL(o.numCiv, '') || '|' || NVL(o.espCiv, '') IN (SELECT bc.id.idDwh FROM SitCivicoTotale ac, SitCivicoTotale bc WHERE ac.id.fkEnteSorgente = '9' AND ac.id.progEs = '3' AND ac.fkCivico = bc.fkCivico AND bc.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bc.id.progEs = '2' AND ac.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineCiv) ORDER BY o.yeaDen desc

named-query.name: DocfaIciReportSogg.getIciPostCiv
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale aso, SitSoggettoTotale bso, SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContrib c, SitTIciOggetto o , SitTIciVia v WHERE aso.id.fkEnteSorgente = '4' AND aso.id.progEs = '3' AND aso.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND aso.fkSoggetto = bso.fkSoggetto AND bso.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bso.id.progEs = '1' AND bso.id.idDwh = s.id AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggIci AND o.yeaDen > TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (:datadocfa, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy') AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND v.id || '|' || NVL(o.numCiv, '') || '|' || NVL(o.espCiv, '') IN (SELECT bc.id.idDwh FROM SitCivicoTotale ac, SitCivicoTotale bc WHERE ac.id.fkEnteSorgente = '9' AND ac.id.progEs = '3' AND ac.fkCivico = bc.fkCivico AND bc.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bc.id.progEs = '2' AND ac.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineCiv) ORDER BY o.yeaDen

named-query.name: DocfaTarReport.getById
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaTarReport d WHERE d.idRep = :id

named-query.name: DocfaTarReport.getVie
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.viaDocfa FROM DocfaTarReport d WHERE UPPER(d.viaDocfa) LIKE '%'||:via||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaTarReport.getCount
named-query.query: SELECT dir.fornitura, COUNT (dir.idRep), (SELECT COUNT (d.idRep) FROM DocfaTarReport d WHERE dir.fornitura = d.fornitura AND d.flgElaborato = '1'), (SELECT COUNT (d.idRep) FROM DocfaTarReport d WHERE dir.fornitura = d.fornitura AND d.flgElaborato = '1' AND d.flgAnomalie = '0'), (SELECT COUNT (d.idRep) FROM DocfaTarReport d WHERE dir.fornitura = d.fornitura AND d.flgElaborato = '1' AND d.flgAnomalie = '1') FROM DocfaTarReport dir GROUP BY dir.fornitura ORDER BY dir.fornitura DESC

named-query.name: DocfaTarReport.getTarsu
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitTTarOggetto o, SitTTarVia v WHERE o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub ORDER BY o.datIni DESC

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getSoggetti
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM DocfaTarReportSogg s WHERE s.id.fkIdRep = :report ORDER BY s.id.dataInizioPossesso, s.id.dataFinePossesso

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getSoggettiTitolari
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM DocfaTarReportSogg s WHERE s.id.fkIdRep = :report AND s.flgTitolareDataDocfa = '1' ORDER BY s.id.dataInizioPossesso, s.id.dataFinePossesso

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getCognomi
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.ragiSoci FROM DocfaTarReportSogg s WHERE UPPER(s.ragiSoci) LIKE :cognome||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getNomi
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.nome FROM DocfaTarReportSogg s WHERE UPPER(s.nome) LIKE :nome||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getCodFisc
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.codiFisc FROM DocfaTarReportSogg s WHERE UPPER(s.codiFisc) LIKE :codFisc||'%'

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getTarAnteUiu
named-query.query: SELECT o , v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c, SitTTarOggetto o, SitTTarVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = :enteSorgenteOrigine AND a.id.progEs = :progOrigine AND a.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND b.id.progEs = '4' AND s.id = b.id.idDwh AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggRsu AND o.datIni < TO_DATE (:dataDocfa, 'yyyyMMdd') AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD(NVL(o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt ORDER BY o.datIni , o.datFin

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getTarPostUiu
named-query.query: SELECT o , v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c, SitTTarOggetto o, SitTTarVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = :enteSorgenteOrigine AND a.id.progEs = :progOrigine AND a.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND b.id.progEs = '4' AND s.id = b.id.idDwh AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggRsu AND o.datIni >= TO_DATE (:dataDocfa, 'yyyyMMdd') AND o.foglio = :foglio AND o.numero = :numero AND LPAD(NVL(o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt ORDER BY o.datIni , o.datFin

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getTarAnteCiv
named-query.query: SELECT o , v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale aso, SitSoggettoTotale bso, SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c, SitTTarOggetto o , SitTTarVia v WHERE aso.id.fkEnteSorgente = :enteSorgenteOrigine AND aso.id.progEs = :progOrigine AND aso.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND aso.fkSoggetto = bso.fkSoggetto AND bso.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bso.id.progEs = '4' AND bso.id.idDwh = s.id AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggRsu AND o.datIni < TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'yyyyMMdd') AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND v.id || '|' || NVL(o.numCiv, '') || '|' || NVL(o.espCiv, '') IN (SELECT bc.id.idDwh FROM SitCivicoTotale ac, SitCivicoTotale bc WHERE ac.id.fkEnteSorgente = '9' AND ac.id.progEs = '3' AND ac.fkCivico = bc.fkCivico AND bc.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bc.id.progEs = '3' AND ac.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineCiv) ORDER BY o.datIni , o.datFin

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getTarPostCiv
named-query.query: SELECT o , v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale aso, SitSoggettoTotale bso, SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c, SitTTarOggetto o , SitTTarVia v WHERE aso.id.fkEnteSorgente = :enteSorgenteOrigine AND aso.id.progEs = :progOrigine AND aso.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND aso.fkSoggetto = bso.fkSoggetto AND bso.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bso.id.progEs = '4' AND bso.id.idDwh = s.id AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggRsu AND o.datIni >= TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'yyyyMMdd') AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND v.id || '|' || NVL(o.numCiv, '') || '|' || NVL(o.espCiv, '') IN (SELECT bc.id.idDwh FROM SitCivicoTotale ac, SitCivicoTotale bc WHERE ac.id.fkEnteSorgente = '9' AND ac.id.progEs = '3' AND ac.fkCivico = bc.fkCivico AND bc.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND bc.id.progEs = '3' AND ac.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineCiv) ORDER BY o.datIni , o.datFin

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getTarAnteUiuUnd
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c, SitTTarOggetto o, SitTTarVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = :enteSorgenteOrigine AND a.id.progEs = :progOrigine AND a.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND b.id.progEs = '4' AND b.id.idDwh = s.id AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggRsu AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND o.datIni < TO_DATE (:dataDocfa, 'YYYYMMDD') AND (o.foglio is null OR o.foglio = :foglio) AND (o.numero is null OR o.numero = :numero) AND (o.sub is null OR LPAD(NVL(o.sub,'0'),4,'0') = :sub) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT tar , v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitTTarOggetto tar , SitTTarVia v WHERE tar.idExtVia = v.idExt AND tar.foglio = :foglio AND tar.numero = :numero AND LPAD(NVL(tar.sub,'0'),4,'0') = :sub)) ORDER BY o.datIni , o.datFin

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getTarPostUiuUnd
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c, SitTTarOggetto o, SitTTarVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = :enteSorgenteOrigine AND a.id.progEs = :progOrigine AND a.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = '2' AND b.id.progEs = '4' AND b.id.idDwh = s.id AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggRsu AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND o.datIni >= TO_DATE (:dataDocfa, 'YYYYMMDD') AND (o.foglio is null OR o.foglio = :foglio) AND (o.numero is null OR o.numero = :numero) AND (o.sub is null OR LPAD(NVL(o.sub,'0'),4,'0') = :sub) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT tar, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitTTarOggetto tar , SitTTarVia v WHERE tar.idExtVia = v.idExt AND tar.foglio = :foglio AND tar.numero = :numero AND LPAD(NVL(tar.sub,'0'),4,'0') = :sub)) ORDER BY o.datIni , o.datFin

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getFamiliariDataDocfa
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p2 FROM SitDPersFam pf2, SitDPersona p2 WHERE pf2.idExtDFamiglia IN (SELECT DISTINCT pf1.idExtDFamiglia FROM SitDPersona p1, SitDPersFam pf1 WHERE pf1.idExtDPersona = p1.idExt AND TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(p1.dtInizioDato,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(p1.dtFineDato,sysdate) AND TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(pf1.dtInizioDato,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(pf1.dtFineDato,sysdate) AND p1.idExt IN (SELECT p.idExt FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitDPersona p WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = '4' AND a.id.progEs = '3' AND a.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = '1' AND b.id.progEs = '1' AND p.dtFineVal IS NULL AND p.id = b.id.idDwh)) AND pf2.idExtDPersona = p2.idExt AND TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(p2.dataNascita,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(p2.dataMor,sysdate) AND TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(p2.dtInizioDato,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(p2.dtFineDato,sysdate) AND TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(p2.dataImm,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(p2.dataEmi,sysdate) AND TO_DATE(:dataDocfa ,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(pf2.dtInizioDato,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(pf2.dtFineDato,sysdate) AND p2.idExt NOT IN (SELECT p.idExt FROM SitSoggettoTotale a , SitSoggettoTotale b, SitDPersona p WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = '4' AND a.id.progEs = '3' AND a.id.idDwh = :idDwhOrigineSogg AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = '1' AND b.id.progEs = '1' AND p.dtFineVal IS NULL AND p.id = b.id.idDwh)

named-query.name: DocfaTarReportSogg.getTarAnte
named-query.query: SELECT o, v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione FROM SitSoggettoTotale a, SitSoggettoTotale b, SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c, SitTTarOggetto o, SitTTarVia v WHERE a.id.fkEnteSorgente = 4 AND a.id.progEs = 3 AND a.id.idDwh = :catpkid AND a.fkSoggetto = b.fkSoggetto AND b.id.fkEnteSorgente = 2 AND o.idExtVia = v.idExt AND b.id.progEs = 4 AND s.id = b.id.idDwh AND o.idExt = c.idExtOggRsu AND c.idExtSogg = s.idExt AND o.datFin <= TO_DATE (:datadocfa, 'yyyyMMdd') AND (LPAD (o.foglio, 4, '0') = :foglio OR o.foglio IS NULL) AND (LPAD (o.numero, 5, '0') = :numero OR o.numero IS NULL) AND LPAD (NVL (o.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub ORDER BY o.datFin DESC

named-query.name: IndirizzoDTO.getIndirizziCatasto
named-query.query: SELECT distinct cu.id.pkidCivi, s.prefisso, s.nome, c.civico, s.dataInizioVal, s.dataFineVal FROM SiticiviUiu cu, Sitiuiu u, Siticivi c, Sitidstr s WHERE cu.id.pkidUiu = u.pkidUiu AND u.id.codNazionale = :ente AND u.id.foglio = :foglio AND u.id.particella = LPAD (:particella, 5, '0') AND u.id.unimm = :sub AND cu.id.pkidCivi = c.pkidCivi AND cu.id.dataFineVal = TO_DATE ('31-12-9999', 'DD-MM-YYYY') AND c.dataFineVal = TO_DATE ('31-12-9999', 'DD-MM-YYYY') AND c.pkidStra = s.pkidStra

named-query.name: IndirizzoDTO.getIndirizziIci
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione, ici.numCiv, ici.yeaDen FROM SitTIciOggetto ici, SitTIciVia v WHERE LPAD (ici.foglio, 4, '0') = :foglio AND LPAD (ici.numero, 5, '0') = :particella AND LPAD (NVL (ici.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub AND ici.idExtVia = v.idExt ORDER BY ici.yeaDen

named-query.name: IndirizzoDTO.getIndirizziTarsu
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT v.prefisso || ' ' || v.descrizione, tar.numCiv, tar.datIni, tar.datFin FROM SitTTarOggetto tar, SitTTarVia v WHERE LPAD (tar.foglio, 4, '0') = :foglio AND LPAD (tar.numero, 5, '0') = :particella AND LPAD (NVL (tar.sub, '0'), 4, '0') = :sub AND tar.idExtVia = v.idExt ORDER BY tar.datFin DESC

named-query.name: SoggettoIciDTO.getSoggettiIci
named-query.query: select 'CONTRIBUENTE' as titolo, s from SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContrib c where s.idExt = c.idExtSogg and c.idExtOggIci = :idExt union select 'CONTITOLARE' as titolo, s from SitTIciSogg s, SitTIciContit c where s.idExt = c.idExtSogg and and c.idExtOggIci = :idExt

named-query.name: SoggettoTarDTO.getSoggettiTarsu
named-query.query: select 'CONTRIBUENTE' as titolo, s from SitTTarSogg s, SitTTarContrib c where s.idExt = c.idExtSogg and c.idExtOggRsu = :idExt
